scenes.background: Bob looks thoughtful, and Monica nods in agreement.
scenes.description: I see your point, but how do you manage to stay so motivated?

options.text: I find motivation in knowing that our work makes a difference.
options.analysis: Your response shows empathy and motivation, as you highlight the impact of your work, though self-regulation and perception could be reinforced.

options.text: Thanks, Bob. Staying focused on goals helps me keep my energy up.
options.analysis: You express gratitude and emphasize goal orientation, reflecting strong perception and motivation, but empathy and self-regulation could be better.

options.text: It's a challenge, but I try to stay positive and take breaks when needed.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the difficulty and share practical strategies, showing good self-regulation and perception, though motivation and empathy could be improved.
